original_text: Go through, go through the gates; prepare ye the way of the people; cast up, cast up the highway; gather out the stones; lift up a standard for the people.
korean_text: 성문으로 나아가라 나아가라 백성이 올 길을 닦으라 큰 길을 수축하고 수축하라 돌을 제하라 만민을 위하여 기치를 들라

sentences.original_text: Go through, go through the gates
sentences.korean_translation: 문들을 통해 나아가라, 문들을 통해 나아가라

sentences.original_text: prepare ye the way of the people
cast up, cast up the highway
lift up a standard for the people
